metrics.name: Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are open and overdue (converted to USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${itp_amount_conv}) FILTER(
	 WHERE (${itp_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itp_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))

metrics.name: Percentage of reversed invoices

metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_invoice_reversal_events}))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of baseline date changes
metrics.description: Percentage of Baseline Date Changes after the Invoice was posted to SAP
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_change_baseline_date})
		AND event_name MATCHES(${itc_posting_to_baseline_update_events}))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Early payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 5 days before their due dates

metrics.name: Invoices without billing doc from SO
metrics.description: Invoices without Billing Document from Sales Order

metrics.name: No-Touch invoice processing rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices with no change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${itc_no_touch_condition})) 
		AND (event_name MATCHES(${itc_clear_invoice_events}))
)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_clear_invoice_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared less than 5 days before and no later than 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: Duration of dunning blocks
metrics.description: Average lead time from setting a dunning block to removing the last dunning block
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_remove_dunning_block_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_set_dunning_block_events})))
)

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events

metrics.name: Average time invoice creation to invoice clearing
metrics.description: Average time from invoice creation to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${itc_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itc_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${itc_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itc_invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices

)

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Fraction of total average cycle time spent on rework
metrics.description: Ratio between net average cycle time spent on rework and total average cycle time

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Percent of cases affected by rework
metrics.description: Number of cases affected by rework divided by the total number of cases

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Average number of reworks per case
metrics.description: Average number, per case, of events that appear at least twice
metrics.signalFragment: AVG((SELECT COUNT(event_name) - COUNT(DISTINCT event_name)))

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Net average cycle time spent on rework
metrics.description: Difference between the average cycle time of the cases that have any rework and the average cycle time of the whole process

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Percent of cases without any rework
metrics.description: Number of cases not affected by rework divided by the total number of cases

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Percent of events affected by rework
metrics.description: Percent of events in the process that appear at least twice
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(
(SELECT COUNT(event_name) - COUNT(DISTINCT event_name))
)
/
SUM((SELECT COUNT(event_name))) * 100

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Average cycle time for cases affected by rework
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event for cases affected by rework

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Number of idle cases
metrics.description: Number of cases that are open long enough to qualify as dropouts

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Percent of cases executed in less than a give time threshold
metrics.description: Percent of cases executed in less than a give time threshold

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Ratio between planned and actual average cycle time
metrics.description: Comparison between planned and actual average cycle time: when > 1 then the actual cycle time is smaller than that planned

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Average custom cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time between two events of interest to the user
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${end_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${start_events}))))
   )

metrics.name: SOL-1742 Average cycle time for open cases
metrics.description: Average cycle time for all currently open cases
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) - FIRST(end_time))) FILTER (
		WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
			WHERE event_name IN (${closing_events}))) IS NULL
   )

metricVariables.name: minimum_loops_condition
metricVariables.description: Minimum number of multiple occurrences for events to be considered as rework, for example: occurrence > 1

metricVariables.name: invoice_reference_date
metricVariables.description: Attributes identifying which field of the accounting document is used for the calculation of the lead time, for example: "InvoiceAccountingDocumentDate"

metricVariables.name: invoice_posting_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoices that have been paid, for example, for payments that have been paid at least 1 day ago: '1days'

metricVariables.name: dunning_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL
metricVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Dunned On" IS NOT NULL

metricVariables.name: invoice_clearing_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor cleared invoices, for example, for invoices that were cleared during last week: '7days'

metricVariables.name: no_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was not cleared, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" IS NULL

metricVariables.name: shipping_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: billing_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoice items, for example 'Create Invoice Item'

metricVariables.name: manual_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was executed manually, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" != 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: automation_potential_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was not automated yet or should not be automated, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog' AND (event_name <> 'Create Invoice Item')
metricVariables.value: ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog')  AND (event_name <> 'Create Invoice')

metricVariables.name: manual_changes_condition
metricVariables.description: Attributes indicating that an event was executed manually, for example "EventCreatedByUserType" = 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: compliance_threshold_time
metricVariables.description: Threshold compliance time, for example '25 days'

metricVariables.name: change_events
metricVariables.description: Events referring to changes made to the case, for example 'Update PO Item PO Quantity', 'Update Opportunity Amount'

metricVariables.name: compliance_milestone_events
metricVariables.description: Events through which the case must flow in order to check for compliance, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: conformance_condition
metricVariables.description: Sequence of events that describes the "to-be" process, for example, using the MATCHES function syntax ^ 'Create Sales Order Item' ~> 'Create Outbound Delivery Item' ~> 'Clear Invoice' $

metricVariables.name: compliance_end_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the end point of the process for the compliance check, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: compliance_start_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the starting point of the process for the compliance check, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

metricVariables.name: invoice_overdue_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice was cleared after the due date, for example "InvoiceAccountingClearingDate" > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

metricVariables.name: closing_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the closing of a case, for example 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won', 'Reject Quote'

metricVariables.name: open_accounts_receivable_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has not been cleared so far, although it was expected to. For example: NOW() > "InvoiceDueDate"
metricVariables.value: "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL

metricVariables.name: threshold_cycle_time
metricVariables.description: Threshold cycle time, for example '4 hours'

metricVariables.name: end_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the end point of the process for the cycle time calculation, for example 'Post Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: start_events
metricVariables.description: Events defining the starting point of the process for the cycle time calculation, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

metricVariables.name: outbound_delivery_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that an Outbound Delivery Item has been created, for example: 'Create Outbound Delivery Item'

metricVariables.name: outbound_delivery_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period in which outbound deliveries have been created, counting backward from today, for example: '7days'

metricVariables.name: sales_order_item_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of a sales order, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'

metricVariables.name: dropout_threshold_time
metricVariables.description: Time threshold for considering a case as idle, for example '21days'

metricVariables.name: case_end_events
metricVariables.description: Events that identify when the case is completed, for example 'Incident Closed', 'Clear Invoice', 'Update Opportunity Stage to: Closed Won'

metricVariables.name: itc_clearing_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

metricVariables.name: itc_amount_conv
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "Inv. Converted USD Amount"

metricVariables.name: itc_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_posting_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor clearing of invoices within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

metricVariables.name: itc_dunning_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL

metricVariables.name: itc_automation_condition
metricVariables.description: Condition indicating that an event was automated, for example "Event Created By User Type" <> 'Dialog'

metricVariables.name: itc_late_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too late

metricVariables.name: itc_posting_to_baseline_update_events
metricVariables.description: Invoice Posting to Baseline date changes event flow

metricVariables.name: itc_billing_doc_to_invoice_events
metricVariables.description: Billing Document to Invoice event flow

metricVariables.name: itc_clear_invoice_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_clearing_period
metricVariables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoice creation to clearing times within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

metricVariables.name: itc_remove_dunning_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the removal of a dunning block for an invoice, for example 'Remove Dunning Block'

metricVariables.name: itc_set_dunning_block_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the setting of a dunning block for an invoice, for example 'Set Dunning Block'

metricVariables.name: itc_change_baseline_date
metricVariables.description: Events that describe a change in baseline date, for example 'Update Baseline Date'

metricVariables.name: itc_early_payment_condition
metricVariables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too early

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_reversal_events
metricVariables.description: Event identifying the reversal of an invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itc_shipping_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Record Goods Issue'

metricVariables.name: itc_no_touch_condition
metricVariables.description: Events that need manual intervention on an invoice and contradict the no-touch rate

metricVariables.name: itc_posting_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the posting date of an invoice, for example "Inv. Posting Document Date"

metricVariables.name: itc_invoice_creation_events
metricVariables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoice items, for example 'Create Invoice'

metricVariables.name: itp_amount_conv
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "Inv. Converted USD Amount"

metricVariables.name: itp_due_date
metricVariables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"
